Name: Mikrocosmos
About the game: This is a party game that combines trading and action elements -- trade with enough as many planets as possible to become the best employee of your company! The Kromo universe is a huge trading business circle. As a new employee of the two major consortiums, your task is to quickly get started with the entire business process and earn profits for your company! Your goal is to establish good 'affinities' with planets through trading. Of course, your competitors won't let you easily grab a whole piece of cake. Burning, killing, and snatching...? Perhaps inevitable! There are all kinds of strange materials used for trading in the Kromo universe. You can use them for trading, but also...fighting? The Game Your task is to buy goods and sell them to planets that need them! How to win: try to establish trade with the entire galaxy and outwit your competition! Earn the price difference by reselling materials. Wait what... no money? We can still go mining, right? . . Use merchandise as weapons to attack your competitors! If you shoot down their spaceship, everything on it will be yours! Obtain additional benefits through various small minigames in the universe If you encounter any bugs, please refer to our game's FAQ in Discussion: /
